name: Untitled Mech Game (bencatcraw)
description:
This is a game made for MechaJam III by UHM Game Dev Club.

Controls:

WASD Movement

1, 2, 3 to Switch Mechs

R Resets Level (for the occasional time you glitch into walls)

Left Mouse Uses Ability

Credits:

Ben Crawford,  Justin Yip,  Aiden Woodard, Benny Trieu, Brandi Wakashige,  Kelsy Padilla, Chris deGuzman, Alyssa, Liam, Dylin, Mia
